#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cmath>
#include <queue>
#include <vector>
#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <stack>
#include <list>
#include <algorithm>
#include <iostream>
#include <assert.h>

using namespace std;

#define SET(v,i) memset(v,i,sizeof(v));
#define FOR(i,n,k) for(int i=n;i<k;++i)
#define WHILE(i,n) while(i<n)
#define RI(i) scanf("%d",&i);
#define RS(i) scanf("%s",i);
#define RF(i) scanf("%lf",&i);
#define RL(i) scanf("%lld",&i);
#define OPEN(s) freopen(s,"r",stdin);
#define CLOSE(s) freopen(s,"w",stdout);

const int INF=0x3F3F3F3F;
const int MAXN=100001;
typedef long long int i64;
typedef pair<int,int> pii;
typedef pair<string,int> psi;

char str[MAXN],str2[MAXN],str3[MAXN];
int idx_2=0,idx_3=0;

void transform(i64 num){
	if(num<2){
		str2[idx_2++] = '0'+(num%2);
		return;
	}
	str2[idx_2++] = '0'+(num)%2;
	transform(num>>1LL);
	return;
}

void sum(){
	int p=strlen(str);
	int q=strlen(str2);
	//fprintf(stderr,"%s %s\n",str,str2);
	int carry = 0;
	while(p>=0 && q>=0){
		if(str[p] == '1' && str2[q]=='1'){
			if(carry) str3[idx_3++] = '1';
			else str3[idx_3++] = '0';
			carry=1;
		}
		if(str[p] == '0' && str2[q]=='1'){
			if(carry){
				carry=1;
				str3[idx_3++] = '0';
			}
			else{
				str3[idx_3++] = '1';
				carry=0;
			}
		}
		if(str[p] == '1' && str2[q]=='0'){
			if(carry){
				carry=1;
				str3[idx_3++] = '0';
			}
			else{
				str3[idx_3++] = '1';
				carry=0;
			}
		}
		if(str[p] == '0' && str2[q]=='0'){
			if(carry){
				str3[idx_3++] = '1';
			}
			else{
				str3[idx_3++] = '0';
			}
			carry=0;
		}
		p--; q--;
	}
	while(p>=0){
		if(str[p]=='1' && carry) str3[idx_3++] = '0';
		else if(str[p] == '0' && carry){
			carry=0;
			str3[idx_3++]='1';
		}
		else str3[idx_3++] = str[p];
		p--;
	}
	while(q>=0){
		if(str2[q]=='1' && carry) str3[idx_3++] = '0';
		else if(str2[q] == '0' && carry){
			carry=0;
			str3[idx_3++]='1';
		}
		else str3[idx_3++] = str2[q];
		q--;
	}
	if(carry) str3[idx_3++] = '1';
	return;
}

int main(){
	#ifdef DM1_MACHINE
		OPEN("FILE.in");
		//CLOSE("FILE.out");
	#endif
	int t; RI(t);
	while(t--){
		SET(str,0)
		SET(str2,0)
		SET(str3,0)
		idx_2=0, idx_3=0;
		RS(str);
		i64 num; RL(num);
		transform(num);
		FOR(i,0,idx_2>>1){
			swap(str2[i], str2[idx_2-i-1]);
		}
		sum();
		FOR(i,0,idx_3>>1){
			swap(str3[i], str3[idx_3-i-1]);
		}
		printf("%s\n",str3);
	}
	return 0;
}


////////////////////////////////////////////
/////////////Code by David Moran////////////
/////////////////////////////P=NP///////////
